title: Office of Public Works starts ball rolling on GPO redevelopment
content: It has issued a tender for a feasibility study. The documents include few details, but they do confirm the likely future uses for the historic building.

title: Children placed in emergency accommodation for kids in care are scared, and high-risk children are more likely to get stuck there
content: “Every child I have been with on admission to emergency placements, whether it is foster care or residential, has told me they are scared,” says Claire Brogan, a practice manager with Barnardos.

title: Sixty-six affordable homes in Ballymun are held up amid council reviews
New Lord of Slane Castle Alex Conyngham planning ‘massive’ gig at iconic Meath venue in summer 2026
content: Slane Castle will be back in the rock and roll business next summer.

title: Storm Floris: Almost 3,000 homes and farms without power as Ireland misses worst of the storm
content: Over 10,000 homes and businesses lost power as Storm Floris swept past Ireland's north west coast with winds gusting to almost 100kmh on Monday morning.

title: Michael Houghton: ‘When we paid €105k for our first house back in 2013, I was concerned we had overpaid by €5k. It still feels the same every time we purchase a property’
content: Recently, we found ourselves sitting in a quiet pub in a small village on the Loop Head peninsula, chatting to a couple who’d bought a property there 20 years ago.

title: Woman who was homeless in Kildare says a stranger’s kindness saved her life
content: James Mahon gave Antoinette Foley a fiver one day in late 2021, sparking a deep friendship – and a photography project.

title: Over ten thousand homes and businesses left without power as Storm Floris hits
content: Weather warnings came into place for a number of counties in the north and west of the country overnight.
